DataElement.preferredName: MBSImP Component 11 Laryngeal Vestibular Closure Height of Swallow Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric score for the assessment of laryngeal vestibular closure - height of swallow in the pharyngeal impairment section of the Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile Pharyngeal Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Laryngeal Vestibular Closure, Height of Swallow
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function._An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing._An observation of an individual's laryngeal vestibular closing and height of swallowing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Concepts.definition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Property.preferredName: Pharyngeal Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Laryngeal Vestibular Closure, Height of Swallow
Property.preferredDefinition: An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing.:An observation of an individual's laryngeal vestibular closing and height of swallowing.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing.

Concepts.longName: Impairment of Laryngeal Vestibular Closure, Height of Swallow
Concepts.definition: An observation of an individual's laryngeal vestibular closing and height of swallowing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: MBSImP:Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile, Martin-Harris et al., 2008
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret study in Rave as requested by D.Lawrence. mc 6/8/16

ValueDomain.preferredName: Laryngeal Vestibular Closure - Height of Swallow Score
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: None; wide column air/contrast in laryngeal vestibule

ValueMeaning.preferredName: None; wide column air/contrast in laryngeal vestibule
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of no laryngeal vestibular closure; wide column air/contrast in laryngeal vestibule.

Concepts.definition: A finding of no laryngeal vestibular closure; wide column air/contrast in laryngeal vestibule.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Incomplete; narrow column air/contrast in laryngeal vestibule

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Incomplete; narrow column air/contrast in laryngeal vestibule
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of incomplete laryngeal vestibular closure; narrow column air/contrast in laryngeal vestibule.

Concepts.definition: A finding of incomplete laryngeal vestibular closure; narrow column air/contrast in laryngeal vestibule.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Complete; no air/contrast in laryngeal vestibule

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Complete; no air/contrast in laryngeal vestibule
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of complete laryngeal vestibular closure; no air/contrast in laryngeal vestibule.

Concepts.definition: A finding of complete laryngeal vestibular closure; no air/contrast in laryngeal vestibule.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret study in Rave as requested by D.Lawrence. mc 6/8/16
